title: Interpretation of seeing a teacher in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a teacher in a dream through the website Vision roy2a.com. The teacher is the one who raises future generations and teaches them all the experiences he acquired during his education. The teacher must possess the professional qualifications to teach a subject, and today through this article we will present to you the interpretation of seeing the teacher in a dream according to the interpreters. Adults like Ibn Sirin, Ibn Kathir, and other dream interpretation scholars, follow us. Interpretation of seeing a teacher in a dream by Imam al-Sadiq. Imam al-Sadiq’s interpretation of seeing a teacher in a dream indicates that the dreamer is a person who has intelligence and a wise mind and makes the right decisions. The teacher’s screaming in a dream indicates that the dreamer will face problems and crises. Seeing the teacher explaining the lesson in a dream states that the dreamer will have a great and prominent position among the people. Shaking the teacher’s hand in a dream indicates that God will bless the dreamer with a lot of goodness, sustenance, and blessings in his life. Reprimanding the teacher in a dream indicates that the dreamer will do many things. Of the wrong things in his life. See other interpretations: Interpretation of seeing a French language teacher in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a teacher in a dream for a single woman. Seeing one teacher shouting at her in a dream says that she is going through a difficult time and feels miserable and sad. The teachings of the monastery teacher in a dream announces that she will achieve great success and distinction in her academic life. And the process. Seeing a single woman in a dream who has become a teacher shows that the girl is strong and has the ability to face all the difficulties in her life. Hugging a teacher in a dream for a single woman shows that she will soon marry a young man who she loves and suits her. See other interpretations: Interpretation of seeing an Arabic language teacher in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a teacher in a dream For a married woman: A teacher in a dream For a married woman, it shows that she is a strong woman who always does her best for her husband and children. Seeing a married teacher scolding her in a dream indicates the many disagreements and problems between her and her husband during this period. Talking to a teacher in a dream about a married woman indicates that her conditions and circumstances will improve for the better in The coming period. Seeing a married woman leading her teacher in a dream indicates that she should listen to the advice of those around her. Interpretation of seeing a teacher in a dream for a pregnant woman. Praise the teacher in a dream about a pregnant woman. It indicates that God will give her the sex of the baby she wants, and God knows best. Seeing a pregnant woman being beaten A teacher in a dream: It indicates that it will lead to some health problems during the birth process, but it will end well, and God knows best. See other interpretations: Interpretation of seeing a teacher in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a teacher in a dream for a man. A mathematics teacher in a dream for a man indicates his high skills in dealing with difficult issues in his life and his ability to Always logical thinking. The teacher hugged him and kissed him in a dream about a man. It indicates that he is pursuing something in his life and will reach it soon, and God knows best. A teacher cries in a dream about a man. It indicates that many happy things will happen in the dreamer’s life. Interpretation of seeing school in a dream for a woman The Bachelorette vision

title: The dream of reading the Qur’an in a dream, which was explained by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: I like itFansSubscribedFans The dream of reading the Qur’an in a dream, which was explained by Ibn Sirin. Seeing the Qur’an being read has many connotations and symbols that point to it and have an impact on the life of the beholder, whether good or bad. Reading the Qur’an in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of dreams. Reading the Qur’an in a dream confirms the purity of the heart and the dreamer’s condition. Seeing the Qur’an being read in one’s dream is a sign of relief from distress and freedom from such worries and problems. Dreaming of reading the Qur’an in a dream can also indicate repayment of debts and profit. From commerce. Interpretation of reading the Qur’an in a dream for a single woman. Only a girl’s dream in a dream is that he is reading the Qur’an, but with a distorted voice and in the wrong way. This indicates that he is far from God Almighty. But if he sees that he is reading a Qur’anic surah in bullying and torture, then this is evidence of the opposite, and a warning of some bad deeds. Which he does.Reading the Qur’an in a dream to a married woman. If a married woman sees in a dream that she is reading the Qur’an in a very low voice, this indicates that she will become pregnant soon. But if a married woman sees in a dream that she is carrying the Qur’an, this indicates the end of problems and the disappearance of evil. If in a dream you see That you are reading the Qur’an in a beautiful and loud voice, it means that you will hear good news. Seeing that he is buying the Qur’an and reading the Qur’an from him indicates that he will reach a prominent position at work. Read the Qur’an in a dream for a pregnant woman. A pregnant woman reading the Qur’an in a dream indicates that she will be free from pregnancy problems. And childbirth in the near future. Seeing reciting the Qur’an in a dream means an easy birth full of goodness. Reading the Qur’an in a dream for a married man. Seeing a man reading the Qur’an in a dream, especially the verses that indicate refuge from Satan, indicates freedom from worries and problems. Seeing a married man reading the Qur’an and concentration The verses in which he asks for forgiveness indicate good circumstances, guidance, and walking on the path of truth. As for a man’s dream of asking for forgiveness after praying and reading the Qur’an, this indicates that God will answer his prayers. Read the Qur’an in a dreamThe interpretation of reciting the Qur’an in a dream has been interpreted by many, many interpreters, and the most important of these interpretations is. This is Read the Qur’an. It indicates closeness to God, a heart filled with faith and a constant desire to listen to the Qur’an. This may have another interpretation, which is that the person dreamed of leaving the Qur’an. This dream came to remind him to continue to get closer to God. Others explain that the dreamer carries many worries and wants to get rid of them by reading the Qur’an. Read the Qur’an in a dream about the jinn. Commentators differ in the interpretation of reciting the Qur’an about the jinn, because some believe that the dreamer is surrounded by many obsessions. He also always thinks about the jinn, goblins, and other obsessions that control his thoughts and appear in his dreams. Some may interpret him as being close to God, and always thinking about him. It is known that the Qur’an has a magical effect in getting rid of obsessive thoughts. Others explain that the dreamer’s heart is immortal during the recitation of the Qur’an and faith controls him and expels the jinn and intermediaries from his life. The inability to read the Qur’an.

title: Interpretation of a dream about finding a mobile phone

preview.html: Seeing a mobile phone in a dream has multiple and varied interpretations and knowing the details of the dream is one of the most important factors in its interpretation. Interpretation of seeing a mobile phone in a dream: The mobile phone is a sign of communication between people and the strengthening of relationships between them. Anyone who dreams of finding a mobile phone indicates that he will achieve goals and desires. It also indicates the return of Absent. The vision shows that the dreamer finds the right path after feeling lost and not achieving the goal. Meaning of seeing a mobile phone in a dream. Dreaming of talking to another person on a mobile phone in a dream indicates that you are hearing good news. Seeing a mobile phone in a dream indicates a radical change in life for the better And moving from one place to another. A black or white cell phone indicates kindness and food. When a single man dreams of a cell phone, this indicates marriage. Interpretation of a dream about separation while talking on the phone. Any person dreams that he is talking to another person on the cell phone and the connection is cut off, indicates That the womb has been cut off. Or it indicates conflicts and rivalries between the monarch and the other person. As for his presence, the chaos of calls between what he sees and another person indicates the dreamer’s feeling of anxiety and tension. This also means that there is a lot of confusion in making an important decision such as work or marriage. Seeing an interruption Service on a mobile phone indicates the presence of evil. Interpretation of a mobile phone explosion: Seeing a mobile phone exploding portends disasters and spreading strife. Anyone who dreams that his mobile phone is broken means that there is a major psychological crisis that the dreamer is going through. As for a dream of a burning phone in a dream, it indicates that the dreamer has fallen In a forbidden relationship.Adultery.The meaning of the appearance of losing a phone indicates loss.Other indications for seeing a cell phoneSee the market.A phone in a married woman’s dream indicates prosperity and family stability.Dreaming about buying a phone for a pregnant woman is a sign of having a male child.Hearing phone ringtones for a pregnant woman indicates ease Delivery and happy news. Seeing a mobile phone in a dream indicates marriage. Breaking a cell phone means separation for married people, canceling the engagement, and separating. Add the dream that you would like to interpret, with reference to the marital status, in a comment below the article, and we will respond to it and clarify it.

title: Interpretation of a dream about prayer: seeing someone praying in a dream

preview.html: A vision of prayer for single people, for married people, for pregnant women, for divorced women, for both single and married people, whether in the mosque, dawn prayer, noon prayer, evening prayer, dawn prayer, funeral prayer, funeral prayer, Eid prayer, and more from Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of prayer in a dream by Ibn Sirin. If it appears that he is praying sitting without an excuse, then his work will not be accepted. If He saw that he was praying next to him, he was sick. And if he saw that he was praying while riding, he would be very afraid. And if he dreamed that the imam was praying with the people while he was riding, then if they were in a state of war, they would be helped. If he saw that he was praying in an orchard, then he would ask God for forgiveness. If he dreamed that he He prays on cultivated land, then God will pay his debts from it. And if he sees that he is praying in a pigeon slaughterhouse, this indicates the corruption that he has committed, and it was said: The boy mistreated him. And if he dreams that he missed an obligatory prayer and did not find a place to spend it, then he will not be able to obtain what he deserves. He asks for it. And if he sees that he is praying in straight rows, then they multiply in glorification and glorification of the Almighty’s saying: (And indeed, we are pure, and we are Glory be to Him). And if he sees that he has neglected the obligatory prayer, then he has underestimated some of the laws. Prostrating in a dream is evidence of victory, evidence of repentance from sin, and evidence of earning money. And evidence of longevity, and evidence of freedom from dangers. And if he sees himself worshiping God Almighty on a mountain, then he will gain an invincible man. And if he sees that he is worshiping someone other than God Almighty, his needs will not be satisfied, and he will be breastfed if he is in war, and he will lose if he is a merchant. And if he sees that he He is standing in prayer and does not bow until his time has passed, then he abstains from the obligatory zakat and does not pay it. And if he dreams that he is praying and eating honey, then he will come to his wife while he is fasting. And if he sees that he is sitting in the tashahhud, it will free him from his worries and satisfy his need. And if he sees that he is saying hello and leaving All of his prayers, then he has relieved himself of his worries. If the greeting is on his right and not on his left, then some of his conditions are correct. If the greeting is on his left rather than his right, then some of his conditions are confused. And if he dreams that he is praying to the Kaaba, this indicates the integrity of his religion, and in prayer it indicates That he rejected Islam behind his back by committing some major sins. And if he saw that he was not guided in the direction of the Qiblah, then he was confused about his matter; Because if he prays in a direction other than the qiblah, while wearing white clothes while reading the Qur’an, it is part of the ruling on Hajj. What is required is what God Almighty says: “Wherever they turn, God will direct them.” And if someone who is not an imam sees in his waking hours that he is leading the people in prayer, then the guardianship will be people who deserve honesty and are obedient. And if he sees in their prayer a decrease or increase or a change in his matter, and he is affected by the poverty of the thieves and their misfortunes, then He prayed with them standing while they were sitting: he did not fall. The lack of their rights and falling short of his rights or seeing it indicates that he is caring for a sick person. If he prays with people sitting and they are standing, then he has fallen behind in a matter he attends to, and if he prays with people standing and sitting, then he is following the order and arrangement of the rich. A poor person, and if he prays with them sitting, then he may be afflicted by drowning, theft, or deficiency. And if he sees that he is praying with women, then he is following up on the affairs of a weak person. If the mother is with the people next to him or lying down and wearing white clothes and giving birth to him, she denies that and is not read in his prayer. He does not grow old and then dies and people pray over him, and likewise if he sees

title: What you do not know about the interpretation of the hijab in a dream according to some jurists

preview.html: Learn about the interpretation of seeing and wearing the hijab in a dream. The interpretation of the hijab in a dream differs if the dreamer is a man or a woman, single or married, and if the woman is pregnant or a single or married girl, then every vision brings good and evil. Interpretation of seeing the hijab in a dreamWhen a person sees a silencer in In a dream, this vision is very good news of good and abundant food, and this food will be blessed by God (Glory be to Him) and evidence to the fortuneteller that the situation will change for the better. If a person sees a veil in a dream, then feels delirious and swallows, it does not indicate the religious veil, but rather the veil that stifles the mind and distracts it from consciousness, and it is evidence that he will fall into a misfortune, and that the fortuneteller will feel delirious and will not be able to solve the problem. And if a young man sees Wearing a veil in a dream, this is good news, and this vision is evidence that he will obtain a new job and obtain a lot of money, and perhaps this young man will be blessed with a fair virgin who will maintain her home. And family and life, and that it be generous and beautiful. When the dreamer sees that he is taking the veil in a dream from over his wife’s head, this is evidence that he is a puppet and does not envy the people of his household, and that he will be the cause of calamity and a shameful event. . In this house, especially the occurrence of disasters for his wife. Among the interpretations that Al-Nabulsi added to seeing the veil in a dream is evidence of purity of mind and intention, purity of the heart, freedom from hatred, malice and malice, and saving the dreamer from illness and similar harmful things. Interpretation of a dream about removing the veil: A dream about removing the veil in a dream is not evidence of shyness. And the scandal. Every vision contains good and bad. The evil of taking off the veil in a dream is that the fortuneteller or fortune teller makes wrong decisions and may reveal his secret that he has been keeping for a long time, and may not cover the girl’s life and appearance. Scandals and problems in her life. But the best vision of removing the hijab in a dream sometimes indicates making the right decision and walking on the right path after many mistakes and sins and committing indecency and major sins, and perhaps removing the hijab to cover up something else that could be revealed. If a single girl sees that she is taking off her hijab In her dream, and happiness appeared on her face, it is good to get rid of anxiety and sadness, and it is possible to get rid of the inappropriate man in her life for a single girl. When a pregnant woman sees that she is taking off the hijab in a dream, this is evidence that she will be free from sorrows, and also free from the pain that she is exposed to. During pregnancy, and that her baby will be healthy and will not suffer. From fatigue or anxiety. Interpretation of a dream about a veil for a single woman: When an unmarried girl sees that she is touching a veil filled with gold and jewelry, this vision is evidence that God (Glory be to Him) has chosen for her a good and pious man who will make her life full of joy, goodness, happiness and pleasure and compensate her for everything that An event in her life. If an unmarried girl sees that she is wearing a hijab in a dream, and this hijab looks inappropriate and torn, then it is an unpleasant harbinger of problems and misfortunes in the girl’s life, and perhaps a scandal will occur and that this girl will... Destroy. He is surrounded by anxiety, sadness, and brokenness. Interpretation of the Hijab A

But the best vision of taking off the veil in a dream sometimes indicates making the right decision and walking on the right path after many mistakes and sins and committing obscenity and major sins, and perhaps taking off the veil to cover up something else that can be revealed. If a single girl sees that she is taking off her veil in her dream and happiness appears on her face, it is good to get rid of anxiety and sadness and that it is possible to get rid of the inappropriate man in her life. A single girl. When a pregnant woman sees that she is taking off the veil in a dream, this is evidence that she will be freed from sorrows, and also free from the pain she is exposed to during pregnancy, and that her child will be healthy and will not suffer. From fatigue or anxiety. Interpretation of a dream about the veil for a single woman When an unmarried girl sees that she is touching a veil full of gold and jewelry, this vision is evidence that God (Glory be to Him) has chosen for her a righteous and pious man who will make her life full of joy, goodness, happiness and pleasure and compensate her for everything that happened in her life. If an unmarried girl sees that she is wearing a veil in a dream, and this veil looks inappropriate and torn, it is a hateful harbinger of problems and misfortunes in the girl's life, and perhaps a scandal will occur and this girl will be destroyed. And surrounded by anxiety, sadness and brokenness. Interpretation of the veil

title: Seahorses in a dream: Interpretation of seeing eating seahorses in a dream for a married, pregnant, and single woman

preview.html: Dear friends, welcome to the Dream Interpretation website. This article is about the interpretation of sea buckthorn in a dream, where we learn about the meanings associated with a dream about sea buckthorn for married women, pregnant women, single women, and men as well. In this article, we will learn about the meanings related to the consumption of sea buckthorn according to the most famous Islamic interpretations, which is the interpretation of Ibn Sirin as well as Nabulsi. This article is also based on the modern Western approach to interpreting dreams through the psychological analysis of this symbol. First, let us find out what this plant is in order to correctly analyze its appearance in dreams. Buckthorn, buckthorn, sweden, or sidr is a type of plant that belongs to To the Sidr family of the Rosaceae family, it contains desert shrubs with dense leaves that reach a height of several meters. Sea buckthorn or Sidr grows in the mountains as well as on the banks of lakes and rivers and is widespread in the Mediterranean region. Christians believe that the wreath that was placed on the head of Christ Before his crucifixion, it was made from sea buckthorn, suede, or sidr. The fruits of the sea buckthorn tree are sometimes called in Hebrew. It came out in the Middleware dictionary: sea buckthorn or sidr, a low tree with white branches, its flowers are small and complex, its fruits are sweet in taste, and it grows in Egypt and many From the Arab countries bordering the Mediterranean Sea. This was a general overview of the meaning of buckthorn or sidr, both terminologically and linguistically, and now we will discover with you the meaning of this plant or this fruit in a dream. We wish everyone a good and useful continuation.Interpretation of a dream about sea buckthorn by Ibn Sirin. Refer to the book (Interpretation of Great Dreams), the work attributed to Ibn Sirin: Buckthorn in a dream is a man who praised the satisfaction of the one who expresses the honor and strength of his tree, and in his interpretation it is. Ibn Sirin said: Money or nutrition, and its moisture is better than its dryness, and its yellowing does not harm it (unlike the rest of the fruits whose yellow color is disliked, which is the color that indicates illness in the interpretation of dreams): None of the fruit is equivalent to sea buckthorn and rice in interpretation, and perhaps it is better than all of that, Salah and Sidr may refer to money other than dinars or dirhams. It is said that a woman came to Ibn Shirin asking about a dream and said: I saw that a Sidra in my house had fallen, so I picked up its sea buckthorn, and the great sheikh said to her: Do you have an absent husband? ? The woman said yes. He said: Your husband died, and you inherit from him what you collected from the sea buckthorn. Some interpreters said: Sea buckthorn in a dream is conditional on Iraq, and eating sea buckthorn gives the ruler power in ruling, and the sea buckthorn tree is a sign of goodness in general. Interpretation of sea buckthorn in a dream according to Nablus. Sea buckthorn is mentioned in the famous work (Attar). Al-Anam in the interpretation of dreams), where its owner said: Sea buckthorn in a dream means food. This is because of the price of its plants and trees, and its humidity is better interpreted than drought, and for people of religion, knowledge, and ability, it increases their justice or rationality. Therefore, it was said that dignity, glory, and sea buckthorn, as well as the survival of the good situation and stability of the state of sea buckthorn in his waking life, so whoever sees sea buckthorn in his dream and is one of those...

title: Interpretation of a dream about entering a Christian house

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about entering a Christian house by Ibn Sirin• Interpretation of dreams entering a Christian house in a dream. This is evidence that the dreamer is one who follows heresies and magic and is not satisfied with God’s blessings upon him.• As for seeing him transforming into a Christian in a dream, this indicates the inheritance he will receive from a relative of his.• If If a Christian dreams of converting to Islam, this vision differs from other interpretations because it indicates security and lack of fear of the decisions taken. Interpretation of the vision of entering a Christian house in Nablus. Seeing the dreamer entering a Christian house is evidence of the sects and magic that the dreamer follows and also shows the sins he commits. Entering a Christian house in a dream indicates The necessity of getting closer to God Almighty and not following sins and heresies. A dream of entering a Christian house for single people. A girl’s dream in a dream is that she marries a Christian. This vision deserves praise for her, because it indicates getting rid of enemies and victory over them. As for the vision of a believer entering his house and sitting with his companions, this vision indicates On relief from worries, relief from distress, and comfort. If an unmarried girl sees in a dream a Christian entering her house, this vision shows the great status she enjoys. Seeing a dream of entering a Christian house for a married woman Seeing a married woman in a dream marrying a Christian is a sign of good health If he sees that he is eating Christian food, this indicates the conditions of the children. But if he sees that he is turning into a Christian, this shows the problems and issues that he faces. Seeing a married woman entering a Christian house in a dream, this vision indicates pride and honor. Dreaming of entering a Christian house For a man: If a man sees in a dream that he is entering the house of Christians, this vision indicates his marriage to a righteous woman. As for the dream of sitting with Christians, it indicates the high status he acquires. If a man converts in a dream to the religion of Christianity, this indicates the psychological pressure he is subjected to. Add the dream you would like Explain it by referring to the marital status in a comment below the article, and we will respond to it and clarify it.

title: Interpretation of a dream about a bus

preview.html: The interpretation of seeing a bus in a dream is related to the psychological state that the person is in. You may be interested in knowing about the hand in a dream. As the bus is linked to earning a livelihood that the girl obtains, and the bus is an indication that the girl will reach a prominent position that she desires and aspires to, and it is compensation for what she desires. In her life. Seeing a bus or a bus with people arguing in a dream. This indicates a deterioration in the relationship between the dreamer and these people. Riding a bus or bus and not finding a place to sit. This indicates that he is a person who has little interest in the world or does not take advantage of the opportunities available to him. Driving a bus instead From your car in a dream. This indicates an improvement in the viewer’s standard of living and financial circumstances, and God knows best. Seeing smiling and happy faces in a dream on the bus and its connotations of Imam al-Sadiq. This indicates the successful social relationships that the dreamer establishes with those around him. Interpretation of seeing a bus in a dream. There are special interpretations related to the interpretation of seeing a bus. In a dream, we explain it as follows: If a person sees the bus and it overturns, this is evidence that many troubles will occur on it, and God knows best. Whoever sees someone rushing to catch the bus shows that he is waiting for some news and is happy in his life. If a person finds himself running away from the bus driver, this is evidence that he He is escaping from a problem that he cannot solve, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing a bus in a dream for a married woman. The interpretation of seeing a bus in a married woman differs from its interpretation in other cases, and we explain it as follows: To see a married woman on the bus riding with her family is a sign of her family’s protection and strengthening her with their presence, by God. I know. A woman’s dream that she is listening to music while she is on the bus is a sign of the psychological comfort she experiences in her life. The presence of a married woman on the bus and her fear of the speed at which the bus is moving is evidence of her concern for her husband, but he will be fine, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing the bus in a dream For a single woman, the interpretation of seeing a bus in a dream for a single woman is related to the psychological state she is experiencing, and we explain this as follows: A single woman who sees herself rushing to ride the bus is evidence of her desire to achieve her goals and achieve everything she wants, and God knows best. If a girl dreams that she is afraid to ride the bus, this is a sign She is very keen on her desire to isolate herself from people and needs some time to calm down. A girl’s desire to sleep on the bus is strong evidence of her desire to travel to a place she aspires to, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing a bus in a dream for a pregnant woman: Seeing a pregnant woman riding the bus in her dream is related to the amount of stress she is exposed to. During her pregnancy, we explain this as follows: A pregnant woman’s dream that she is riding a bus with people she does not know is evidence that she wants to see her newborn and he misses her. The presence of a pregnant woman on the bus with her husband and she is happy to be on the bus is evidence of her husband’s interest in her. If she sees If a pregnant woman found someone helping her on the bus and she became sad, this is a sign that she will give birth soon, and her birth will be easy. Interpretation of seeing a bus in a dream

title: Interpretation of rape in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of rape in a dream: One of the most disturbing and disgusting visions that a person can think of during his sleep is rape, and given the dreamer’s anxiety about this dream and the dark thoughts that he has after waking up from this dream, the interpretations associated with this dream seem to be many and varied according to the interpretation of scholars. And experts, for example, the interpretation of rape in a dream is an indication of the weakness of his faith, or that the dreamer’s vision that someone is raped is evidence of its commission. Sins and transgressions. Interpretation of rape in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Seeing a dreamer raping a girl during sleep indicates his evil intention and distance from God Almighty. Seeing a girl in a dream that someone is raping her indicates that she feels her frozen desires. The girl’s rejection in a dream symbolizes someone trying to rape her, and that she She will suffer great harm. Rape in an unmarried woman’s dream may indicate her distance from God and her committing sins. Seeing a married woman being pushed by a stranger indicates that she will go through marital problems and quarrels. Interpretation of harassment in a dream for a single woman: The dream itself has many different meanings, which we mention as follows: Rape in a dream of an unmarried woman indicates problems, problems, pressures, and accusations that she will go through in her life. If the harasser is a relative of the dreamer, she should beware of him because he hides illness and harms her. Harassment in a single woman’s dream may indicate illicit love for her life. Harassment of a relative symbolizes illness. It is dangerous, and God Almighty knows best. Interpretation of a dream about rape of a married woman: When a married woman sees her husband raping her in a dream, this indicates the intensity of his love for her and his desire to stay close to her permanently. The meaning of this dream may be the woman’s distress towards her husband and his actions, and his hatred for much of his nature. Interpretation of a dream Rape of a pregnant woman: A husband raping his wife in a dream indicates how much he loves her. If a wife sees her husband rushing her in a dream, this means that her due date is near and the birth will be easy. Interpretation of a dream about molesting children. Harassing a child in a dream may indicate prohibited money earned by the head of the family, which is A warning message that he must repent and return to the right path. Interpretation of a dream about a strange man harassing me: Seeing an unknown man rushing the dreamer indicates problems and difficulties that she will face in her life, so she should be careful and stay away from suspicions. At the end of our article we wanted to remind you that rape in general indicates in a dream To the problems that the dreamer faces, and we tried to explain some cases through our article today, such as the interpretation of rape for pregnant and married women. Or a single woman, or the interpretation of child molestation in a dream.
